tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

waterGun.name: Water Gun
waterGun.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

thunderShock.name: Thunder Shock
thunderShock.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

vineWhip.name: Vine Whip
vineWhip.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

quickAttack.name: Quick Attack
quickAttack.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

hydroPump.name: Hydro Pump
hydroPump.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

razorLeaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorLeaf.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

iceBeam.name: Ice Beam
iceBeam.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the target. This may also leave the target frozen.

solarBeam.name: Solar Beam
solarBeam.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

dragonClaw.name: Dragon Claw
dragonClaw.description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

airSlash.name: Air Slash
airSlash.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

fireBlast.name: Fire Blast
fireBlast.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flashCannon.name: Flash Cannon
flashCannon.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

skullBash.name: Skull Bash
skullBash.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

sleepPowder.name: Sleep Powder
sleepPowder.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

dynamicPunch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamicPunch.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

crossChop.name: Cross Chop
crossChop.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

bulletPunch.name: Bullet Punch
bulletPunch.description: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

closeCombat.name: Close Combat
closeCombat.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

shadowBall.name: Shadow Ball
shadowBall.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

sludgeBomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgeBomb.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

darkPulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkPulse.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.

thunderPunch.name: Thunder Punch
thunderPunch.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

extremeSpeed.name: Extreme Speed
extremeSpeed.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

stoneEdge.name: Stone Edge
stoneEdge.description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones from below. Critical hits land more easily.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

xScissor.name: X-Scissor
xScissor.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

swordsDance.name: Swords Dance
swordsDance.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

ironHead.name: Iron Head
ironHead.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

ironTail.name: Iron Tail
ironTail.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

rockSlide.name: Rock Slide
rockSlide.description: Large boulders are hurled at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

nightSlash.name: Night Slash
nightSlash.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

psychoCut.name: Psycho Cut
psychoCut.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

focusBlast.name: Focus Blast
focusBlast.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

calmMind.name: Calm Mind
calmMind.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

overdrive.name: Overdrive
overdrive.description: The user attacks by causing a loud sound vibration. This may also make the target flinch.

poisonJab.name: Poison Jab
poisonJab.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

boomburst.name: Boomburst
boomburst.description: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

shiftGear.name: Shift Gear
shiftGear.description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.

dragonPulse.name: Dragon Pulse
dragonPulse.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

dazzlingGleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzlingGleam.description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

aurasphere.name: Aura Sphere
aurasphere.description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move never misses.

roost.name: Roost
roost.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash
iciclecrash.description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

iceShards.name: Ice Shard
iceShards.description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

leafBlade.name: Leaf Blade
leafBlade.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

stoneedge.name: Stone Edge
stoneedge.description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones from below. Critical hits land more easily.

aerialAce.name: Aerial Ace
aerialAce.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.
